content: In looking at May 2016 candidate versus current build version of spec, which should I regard as the more likely version to be on the upcoming ballot? Pretty sure the it's the latter.
More current AND (importantly) more likely to be what is approved in the upcoming ballot. Right?
Well, the ballot will be a snapshot on the CI build that will be taken around the beginning of August (and will freeze for QA in the latter part of July.
